long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Harpi's extension enables you to record RPA tasks so they can be run later on when you need to. 
Start the recorder to save your clicks, input filling, file download, and be able to replay them whenever you want.
You can also search for specific element in the page, use variables, and compare values.


## VERSION NOTES ##
26/02/2020 - v1.0.5:
-Add logical path (conditional steps)
24/02/2020 - v1.0.4:
-New features: Reorder events, go to specific URL, handle select change event, add new variables from dropdown
-UI improvement
-Bug correction: stop collecting clicks after recording has stopped
05/02/2020 - v1.0.3:
-Add a in-extension notification system to help you know better what you are doing
-Fix bugs (discovering file inputs has a broader compatibility)
28/01/2020 - v1.0.2:
-Support of new features (take screenshot at any point of a task, add timer to anticipate long loading time)
-UI improvements (icons corresponding to each step type have been added)
22/01/2020 - v1.0.1:
-Support of new features (saving doubleclicks, right clicks, tab hits...)
-Fix bugs (better support of iframe position, fallback when elements not fund, improve finding input of type 'file')
